edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.gui.prefs

Class PreferenceComponent<V,C extends java.awt.Component>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.gui.prefs.PreferenceComponent<V,C>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorPanel, FilePanel, PreferenceSpinner

    public abstract class PreferenceComponent<V,C extends java.awt.Component>
extends java.lang.Object
    A component that is associated with a Preference.

      • apply

        public void apply()
        Gets the value from this component and applies it to the program. This involves setting the value stored by this Preference, as well as changing anything elsewhere that should change based on the new value. If the latter is necessary, this method should be overwritten, with a call to super() included.

      • show

        public void show()
        Sets this component to show its preference's value.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets this component to the default value.
